title: First Time Fabric Art: Step-by-Step Basics for Painting and Printing on Fabric
description: This 32-page book explores a variety of techniques for painting and printing on fabric, using products that are easy to get. A few can be made with materials and tools you can find around the house! Techniques include stenciling, screen printing, stamping, sun printing, and tie dyeing. Begin with plain muslin or other cotton fabric, and transform it into an exciting and versatile fabric for quilting, crafting, garment sewing, or home d√©cor. Step-by-step instructions with large photos make it easy to learn these basic techniques. Step into the world of fabric art with Susan Stein, a Minnesota Quilter of the Year!
author: Susan Stein
